basic.description: This course allows students to use film and media studies theory to critically engage in and interpret a series of popular sport-related films. By the end of the course, students are able to write and think critically about the role that film in general, and sport-based films in particular, play in promoting and challenging dominant formations of gender, sexuality, nationalism, race, social class, and ability in Western society.
basic.subject: SPM
basic.title: Sport and Film
